wikipedia_page.main: Joseph Henry Orme (8 November 1884 – June 1935) was an English professional footballer who played as a goalkeeper in the Football League for Nottingham Forest.

response: At Orient, Jonas could play in almost any position, even making several appearances in goal. He was sent off during a match at Millwall in January 1915 for fighting with the home goalkeeper Joseph Orme, an incident which started a riot among the 16,900 crowd that had to be quelled by police on horseback.Neilson Kaufman & Alan Ravenhill, "Leyton Orient: The Complete Record", Breedon Books, 2006, pp.224.
